channel.title: IP Ban in RS2?
channel.description:
Hey.. does jagex do ip ban now??????????? Yesterday, Jagex banned over 21 of my accounts(every single one) most of which i never even macro'd on... they have no reason, and all i got banned for was "Permenent Ban"... im like wtf... i dont have a single non-banned rs2 account anymore.. I think rs2 is doing ip ban now...
o yeh.. and i tried to appeal... within 2 minutes i recieved "DENIED".......

item.title: IP Ban in RS2?
item.dc:creator: @PaulT PaulT
item.description:
@PaulT wrote:

Well, they can look at your passwords, UIDs, playing time, etc…they could figure out that you are a cheater and ban all your accounts without even knowing your IP.

But they do IP ban now, yes, if you were IP banned you would get a message when you try to log in on any chr “This address has been IP banned” or whatever.

Read full topic
